name: Colority (DEMO)
description:
Colority is a level based puzzle game.

You can change your position with arrow keys you can adjust the level according to you.

DEVELOPERS

Lead Programmer & Lead Artist : Bertan Gökalp

Programmer : Erdem Kurt

Designer & 2D Artist : Gamze Bayraktar

Designer & 2D Artist : Ahmet Emin Yazıcı

2D Artist : İlkan Gökalp
